title: How to Unhide or Hide Tagged Posts on Instagram

steps.title: Go to the profile of the person who posted the photo.
steps.content: Go to the profile of the person who posted the photo. As you may have figured by now, Instagram does not make it very easy to unhide tagged photos–once you hide a photo, the only way to find it again is to go to the profile of the person who originally posted it. You can do this by clicking the magnifying glass icon towards the bottom left of the screen, then using the Search bar to search for their name. Once you find the right profile, tap it to see their photos. [1] X Research source While there's no easy way to view the tagged photos you hid, we have come up with a workaround for next time you want to hide a photo you're tagged in. If you hid the photo recently, it should be near the top of the person's profile.

steps.title: Tap the hidden photo.
steps.content: Tap the hidden photo. If you are on the poster’s profile, tap the preview of the photo you currently have hidden. If you are scrolling through your notifications, tap the square preview of the photo on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Press the three dots in the top-right.
steps.content: Press the three dots in the top-right. This will open up a menu with several different options for the post. [2] X Research source Alternatively, tap your tag in the photo and select Show On My Profile .

steps.title: Tap Post Options.
steps.content: Tap Post Options . A new menu will appear.

steps.title: Select Show On My Profile.
steps.content: Select Show On My Profile . To check that the post has successfully been unhidden, tap your profile picture in the bottom right and drag down to refresh. Then, tap the icon of a person in a box located in the middle of the screen and look for the post.

steps.title: When someone tags you in a post, save the post before hiding it.
steps.content: When someone tags you in a post, save the post before hiding it. Even if the photo seems too unflattering or embarrassing to show on your profile, tap the bookmark icon at the bottom-right to save it before you hide it. Then, if you decide to unhide the post later, you won't have to search through someone's entire profile to find it. After tapping the bookmark, you can tap New collection to create a dedicated collection for your tagged photos. Then, each time you get tagged, you can tap the bookmark and select this collection to easily find it later.

steps.title: Tap your profile photo at the bottom-right corner of Instagram.
steps.content: Tap your profile photo at the bottom-right corner of Instagram. If you want to limit who can tag you in posts, you can manually approve tags instead of allowing them to appear on your profile instantly. You can also limit who can tag you on Instagram, and block tags altogether.

steps.title: Tap the menu icon.
steps.content: Tap the menu icon. It's the three-line icon at the top right. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Tags and mentions.
steps.content: Tap Tags and mentions . It's under "How others can interact with you." You may have to scroll down a little to find it.

steps.title: Choose who can tag you.
steps.content: Choose who can tag you. If you don't want to allow people to tag you in photos and reels at all, you can select Don't allow tags . Otherwise, you can choose Allow tags from everyone or Allow tags from people you follow .

steps.title: Toggle on "Manually approve tags" if needed.
steps.content: Toggle on "Manually approve tags" if needed. If you want to approve photos you're tagged in before they appear on your profile, you can toggle on this feature.

steps.title: Approve or reject tags.
steps.content: Approve or reject tags. Now, when someone tags you in an Instagram photo or video, you can approve or reject the tag. Tap the notification of the new tag to view the post. Tap your username. Tap next to "Show in Profile." [4] X Research source

steps.title: Open your tagged photos.
steps.content: Open your tagged photos. To get there, just tap the icon of a tag with a person inside at the top of your profile grid.

steps.title: Tap the photo you want to hide.
steps.content: Tap the photo you want to hide. This opens the photo in full view. If you might want to unhide the photo in the future, just tap the bookmark icon below the bottom-right corner to save it to your bookmarks. This way, you won't have to search through someone's profile to find it again. To hide multiple photos at once, tap Select at the top-right, tap the photos you want to hide, and then tap Hide at the bottom-left.

steps.title: Tap the three dots and select Post options.
steps.content: Tap the three dots and select Post options . You'll see the three dots at the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Hide from my profile.
steps.content: Tap Hide from my profile . The photo is now hidden from your profile. Even though you hid the photo from your profile, you are still tagged in the photo. If you want to untag yourself completely, tap Remove me from post instead.

steps.title: How do I see hidden photos I'm tagged in?
steps.content: How do I see hidden photos I'm tagged in? Instagram doesn't show you the posts you're tagged in and have hidden in one easy-to-find area. If you want to see the tagged photos you've hidden, you have to find the posts on the user's profile.

steps.title: How do I see all the photos I'm tagged in?
steps.content: How do I see all the photos I'm tagged in? If you haven't hidden the photos, you can go to your Instagram profile and tap the icon of a tag with a person inside to view all photos you're tagged in.

steps.title: How do I unhide all tagged photos on Instagram?
steps.content: How do I unhide all tagged photos on Instagram? Because there is nowhere on Instagram to see a list of the pictures you're tagged in but have already hidden, we recommend bookmarking every photo you're tagged in before hiding them from your profile. This way, if you decide to unhide the photo later or untag yourself, it'll be easy to find.

steps.title: What happens if I hide a post I'm tagged in on Instagram?
steps.content: What happens if I hide a post I'm tagged in on Instagram? When you hide a post you're tagged in, it will not appear on the tag section of your profile. The person who made the post will not be notified that you hid the post. Additionally, the tag will not be removed.

steps.title: How do you see hidden tags on Instagram stories?
steps.content: How do you see hidden tags on Instagram stories? If someone tagged you in a Story but hid the tag, you'll still be notified of the tag via direct message. Just tap the DM from the person who tagged you, then tap the story to view it. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Are my tagged photos on Instagram private?
steps.content: Are my tagged photos on Instagram private? If someone tags you in an Instagram photo and their profile is not private, anyone who can view your profile can also see the tagged photo. If the person's account is private, the tagged post will only be visible to people with permission to view both of your profiles.
